price: Allah said, “Be gone[58]! Whoever among them follows you, Hell will be an ample recompense for you all.
arabic: قَالَ ٱذۡهَبۡ فَمَن تَبِعَكَ مِنۡهُمۡ فَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ جَزَآؤُكُمۡ جَزَآءٗ مَّوۡفُورٗا
footnotes: [58] This and the next commands were actually a threat.
